thread.title: #ROCtheWinter: Would you like some gloves with that morning frost?
thread.title_full: #ROCtheWinter: Would you like some gloves with that morning frost?

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: #ROCtheWinter: Would you like some gloves with that morning frost?
text:
Winter Is Coming If John Snow was going to deliver this news to me everyday, I might be ok with it. Take a look at your Saturday forecast, and prepare to plan ahead.
The One Story You Should Read Today
No one should ever have to go through what Kennis Cady, a 12-year-old East Rochester girl, and her family went through. Parents of teenagers: there are ways you can get help if your child is being bullied at school.
You're Going To Want To Order In Tonight
And food writer Tracy Schuhmacher knows just the place . I promise you this: when you go to sleep tonight you will be dreaming of pork belly buns and chicken pho soup.
15 Things Only People From Rochester Know About Winter
Mass chaos and pandemonium? Ptfff.
#3. You'd never skip out on plans to go out to Murphy's Law just because there's 4 inches of snow on the ground.
#12. It's like a totally normal thing to go XC skiing on sidewalks around Park Ave. and Cobbs Hill.
Get the full list here .
Send Us Your #ROCtheWINTER Photos
#bicycle #love on 142 Atlantic Ave., #Roc Photo by Marie De Jesus/@mariedennise
A photo posted by DemocratandChronicle (@democratandchronicle) on Mar 3, 2013 at 7:20am PST
Every day we pick our favorite as part of the ongoing #ROCtheWinter photo contest. Today's pic is from reader Marie De Jesus.
Keep sending them in through Twitter or Instagram using our hashtag. One lucky winner will win a free snowblower from X business .
If You Are Planning To Call In Sick
Please don't use this excuse about your grandma poisoning you with ham.
You're Going To Need Gloves With That
We told you the frost is coming, so how about hooking yourself up with a sweet pair of gloves from X business ? They've got a sale running all weekend long. And
Countdown To The Fun
X days until #ROCtheWinter kicks off.
Get excited. Get more details here .
Have You Checked Out Our Ultimate Guide To Winter In Rochester?
It's got everything you could possibly need to #ROCtheWINTER.
So you can #ROCtheWINTER (Photo: Brough to you by Victor Chevy.)
